metadata.title: CVE-2022-2588 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: It was discovered that the cls_route filter implementation in theLinux kernel would not remove an old filter from the hashtable beforefreeing it if its handle had the value 0.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
